column5: Gave her a full day Sunday, the morning was great. 4 pike landed, two each, one spinnerbait one jerkbait fish for each of us. Biggest fish came on a clown color suspending Long A.. then in the evening lost my first true trophy of the season. The big one that got away plus the decent one landed in the morning just jettisoned my pike addiction into next month.
...aaah the one that got away...keeps us all going back! The one you got looks pretty good though (although I think the pose might be giving it a bit of help!)
pose or not, that's a nice looking pike  looks like maybe 32" or more ?

Thanks, there is indeed some photo magic involved, lol. In my inflatable boat the camera only gets about 5 feet away, max, lmao, the arms length hold probably wasn't necessary, but meh. It looks huge. Haha  We estimated it around 32-33" range
Thats still a decent pike for southern ontario. Good Job
Nice pike! Too bad about the one that got away, we all have them. lol
Nice size pike. the big ones always find a way to get off. thats what keeps us going back. Im sure you will get her
Beauty fish Rich. As said the one that got away keeps us coming back!!!!!
The pike you caught is more than I have caught this year so far!!   Great report...and the one that got away will be bigger the next time....
